meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively concerned with one's own interests or success.
meanings.sent1: Her pursiness was evident in how she always put her needs above others.
meanings.sent2: His pursiness often led him to prioritize his career over personal relationships.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pursiness, he still found time to help his friends when they needed him.
meanings.sent4: The pursiness of the CEO drove the company to great success.
meanings.sent5: The pursiness of the student made them stand out in their determination to excel.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly ambitious or driven in pursuit of goals.
meanings.sent1: Their pursiness in achieving their dreams inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's pursiness propelled them to break records and win championships.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pursiness, he always made time for his family and friends.
meanings.sent4: The pursiness of the explorer led them to discover new lands and cultures.
meanings.sent5: Her pursiness shone through as she worked tirelessly towards her aspirations.
